turkish_example_sentence: Ben bu zor projede çalışmasam daha rahat bir hayatım olur.
english_example_sentence: If I were not to work on this difficult project, I would have a more comfortable life.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы я не работал над этим сложным проектом, у меня была бы более комфортная жизнь.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Ben bu zor projede ______ daha rahat bir hayatım olur.
